SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Configuration
Represents the configuration settings for the Real-Time Event Ticketing System.
ConfigurationController
REST controller for managing the system configuration.
CorsConfig
Configuration class for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS).
Customer
Represents a Customer in the ticketing system.
InputService
A service class for managing user input in the ticketing system.
LogConfigChecker
This class checks the Log4j2 configuration and prints the loaded configuration URI.
LogController
REST controller for managing and retrieving application logs.
LoggerTest
A test class for verifying the logging functionality.
LoggerUtil
The LoggerUtil class provides the logging functionality for the system.
RealtimeTicketingApplication
Entry point for the Real-Time Event Ticketing System application.
SimulationController
REST controller for managing the ticketing simulation.
SimulationService
Manages the ticketing simulation by coordinating vendors, customers, and the ticket pool.
TicketController
REST controller for managing ticket-related operations.
TicketingSystemCLI
Command-Line Interface (CLI) entry point for the Real-Time Event Ticketing System.
TicketPool
Represents the shared ticket pool in the Real-Time Event Ticketing System.
Vendor
Represents a Vendor in the ticketing system.
WebSocketConfig
Configuration class for WebSocket communication.
